page.title: 18 POPULAR CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: My name is Matthew.My favourite game is {football}.The object of the game is to have two teams who try to kick the ball into the other team's goal.The team with the most goals wins. My friend's favourite game is {marbles}.The object of this game is to roll your marble towards the other person's marble.If you hit it you win the game and the marble. Nina's favourite game is {netball}.In this game you have to pass the ball to a different player in your team and then,when the ball is close enough,you have to throw the ball into the net.The team who does this most times wins the game. These are our favourite children's games.
